title: Innocence Reborn
description: INNOCENCE REBORN...Immerse yourself in the final chapter of The Journeys of Innocence trilogy as Siobhan and Blake complete the final and climactic ending to their story.We rejoin the newly reconnected pair as they come to terms with the painful news that Siobhan’s protector and Blake’s friend has been murdered. To find answers and to avenge his death, they are whisked away on a frantic flight to Las Vegas where Blake will stop at nothing to see his very specific kind of justice served.A journey filled with danger, pain, and devastating heartbreak. The tentacles of which reach and wrap around them all.The fight for survival is now on. Thinking the end is in sight, nothing will stop them from seeing it through to the end, and succeeding.The path they are destined to travel takes them from deep within the earth to the highest penthouses. Only time could unfold the dangers that face them.Rejoined by much loved friends, they are once more forced to watch those closest to them suffer in their journey. The repercussions of this will turn out to be long lasting and have dire consequences for them all. With years of immortality ahead of them, the mere thought may be too much to bear.Follow them on the final stage of their journey to see if their love and combined strength is enough to help them complete their Journey of Innocence.
author: Helen  Johnston
